RelatedSentence: New Delhi : Buoyed by Narendra Modi - led BJP 's emphatic victory in the Lok Sabha polls , mayors of Delhi have claimed that hurdles imposed on the MCD by previous Congress regimes in the state and the Centre would now be cleared and stalled work in all three civic bodies would get expedited .
Mayors of both North and South Delhi hailed the party 's landslide win in the elections that saw BJP storming to power at the Centre with a clear majority by bagging 282 seats .
